Class VectorizedSpatialOptimizer

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial.VectorizedSpatialOptimizer
public final class VectorizedSpatialOptimizer extends Object
SIMD-aware optimizer for spatial buffers.

Filters points outside the visible bounds using Vector API comparisons while keeping the compaction zero-allocation and in-place.

Configuration keys (via ChartAssets):

  • Chart.ai.optimizer.enabled
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.minPixelDistance
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.minPixelDistanceX
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.minPixelDistanceY
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.preservePeaks
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.exportPeaks
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.depthNear
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.depthFar
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.depthScale
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.zDampingFactor
  • Chart.ai.optimizer.zDampingMode (LINEAR/EXPONENTIAL)
Since:
1.7.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

      Sets the minimum pixel distance between retained points.
      Parameters:
      minPixelDistance - minimum distance in pixels
      Returns:
      this optimizer

    • setMinPixelDistance

      public VectorizedSpatialOptimizer setMinPixelDistance(double minPixelDistanceX, double minPixelDistanceY)
      Sets independent minimum pixel distances for X and Y.
      Parameters:
      minPixelDistanceX - minimum distance for X in pixels
      minPixelDistanceY - minimum distance for Y in pixels
      Returns:
      this optimizer

    • setDepthAttenuation

      public VectorizedSpatialOptimizer setDepthAttenuation(double nearDepth, double farDepth, double scale)
      Enables depth-based scaling for the pixel distance filter.
      Parameters:
      nearDepth - minimum depth (closest)
      farDepth - maximum depth (farthest)
      scale - depth scale factor (0 disables)
      Returns:
      this optimizer

    • setDepthDamping

      public VectorizedSpatialOptimizer setDepthDamping(double dampingFactor, VectorizedSpatialOptimizer.DepthDampingMode mode)
      Sets the depth-based damping factor and mode used to scale the pixel-distance threshold.
      Parameters:
      dampingFactor - factor in the range [0..1] (values <= 0 disable damping)
      mode - damping mode (linear or exponential)
      Returns:
      this optimizer

    • setPreservePeaks

      public VectorizedSpatialOptimizer setPreservePeaks(boolean preservePeaks)
      Enables or disables local peak preservation.
      Parameters:
      preservePeaks - true to force retention of local min/max points
      Returns:
      this optimizer

    • setExportPeaks

      public VectorizedSpatialOptimizer setExportPeaks(boolean exportPeaks)
      Enables or disables exporting peak anchors into the spatial buffer metadata.
      Parameters:
      exportPeaks - true to capture peak anchors
      Returns:
      this optimizer

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the internal state for a new stream.

    • applyBoundsFilter

      public int applyBoundsFilter(SpatialBuffer buffer, int count, PlotContext context, boolean pixelSpace)
      Applies a bounds filter to the spatial buffer.
      Parameters:
      buffer - spatial buffer containing xyz triples
      count - number of points in the buffer
      context - plot context for bounds
      pixelSpace - if true, bounds are derived from plot pixel bounds
      Returns:
      new point count after filtering

    • applyBoundsFilterDelta

      public int applyBoundsFilterDelta(SpatialBuffer buffer, int startLogicalIndex, int count, PlotContext context, boolean pixelSpace)
      Applies a bounds filter to a ring buffer window and compacts hits to the front.
      Parameters:
      buffer - spatial buffer (ring-enabled)
      startLogicalIndex - logical start index in the ring
      count - number of points to scan
      context - plot context for bounds
      pixelSpace - if true, bounds are derived from plot pixel bounds
      Returns:
      new point count after filtering
